body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Henry Thomas and the customer's name is Stephanie Howard.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Henry Thomas, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Henry, I'm Stephanie Howard. I'm looking for some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Stephanie! What type of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm not sure yet, I need to compare a few models.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: No problem! Are you looking for something specific, like a cruiser or a sport bike?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I think a cruiser would be best for me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Excellent choice! Could I also get your email address to send you some information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's stephanie.howard at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And may I have your phone number as well, just in case I need to reach you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's three one two, five six seven, eight nine zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Stephanie. I'll make sure you receive all the details you need.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Henry! I really appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time today, and enjoy your day! Goodbye!
